mapper.select: SELECT id,uid, recv_name AS recvName, recv_province AS recvProvince, recv_city AS recvCity, recv_area AS recvArea, recv_addr AS recvAddr, recv_phone AS recvPhone, recv_tel AS recvTel, recv_zip AS recvZip, recv_tag AS recvTag, recv_district AS recvDistrict, is_default AS isDefault FROM t_address WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY is_default DESC
